other_title: Bishōjo Yūgi Unit Crane Geeru Galaxy (Japanese)
美少女遊戯ユニット クレーンゲール ギャラクシー (Japanese)
plot: Tokiko is summoned by Boss and learns that Dark Gorilla is coming to attack Earth again. A new crane game “Galaxy” has been completed to put up a fight against Dark Gorilla, and the three Crane Game Girls are on a mission to protect Earth once again. However, the enemy intelligence that shows up on their monitor is not about Dark Gorilla, but three girls—idols just like them.
opening_theme: "Galaxy Party" by Natsuko Hara, Rico Sasak, & Sora Tokui
ending_theme: "Zettaiteki Seiten Aozora" (Absolute Blue Sky Weather) by aki
